product_name: mophie Juice Pack Helium Case - iPhone 5
long_description: With its 1500mAh battery, the ultra-thin, protective Mophie Juice Pack Helium case offers your iPhone 5/5s up to 80% extra battery life. It's so thin, you won't believe there's a battery inside. Elegant, thin design makes it the perfect accessory, easily fitting into a pocket or handbag. Enhanced, forward-ported acoustics redirect your iPhone's audio toward you, optimizing playback and maximizing your experience. Charge anywhere by simply flicking a switch; use the LED indicator to check battery level and flip the standby switch when you're ready to use the Juice Pack Helium's battery. You can also simultaneously charge your iPhone and juice pack together with the included microUSB cable.
short_description: With its 1500mAh battery, the ultra-thin, protective Mophie Juice Pack Helium case offers your iPhone 5/5s up to 80% extra battery life. It's so thin, you won't believe there's a battery inside.
